statements: DELETE FROM emission_reductions WHERE location = 'New York' AND reduction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM emission_reductions WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM emission_reductions WHERE timestamp < '2021-07-01' AND reduction_amount > 500;
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM emission_reduction WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND reduction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM emission_reduction WHERE id = 1 AND emission_reduction_amount > 500.00;
